description.brazilian: No nível da Vovó, coloque o Dumpling ao lado do Sashimi
description.english: In Grandma’s level, place Dumpling next to Sashimi
description.french: Dans le niveau de Grand-mère, place Dumpling à côté de Sashimi
description.german: In Großmutters Level, platziere Dumpling neben Sashimi
description.italian: Nel livello della Nonna, posiziona Dumpling accanto a Sashimi
description.japanese: おばあちゃんのレベルで、ダンプリングをサシミの隣に置いてください
description.koreana: 할머니 레벨에서 덤플링을 사시미 옆에 놓으세요
description.latam: En el nivel de la Abuela, coloca Dumpling junto a Sashimi
description.russian: В уровне с бабушкой поставьте Пельмешкина рядом с Рыбкинсом
description.schinese: 在奶奶关卡中，把Dumpling放在Sashimi旁边
description.spanish: En el nivel de la Abuela, coloca Dumpling junto a Sashimi
description.tchinese: 在奶奶的關卡中，把 Dumpling 放在 Sashimi 旁邊
description.turkish: Büyükanne seviyesinde, Dumpling'i Sashimi'nin yanına yerleştir

description.brazilian: Organize todos os itens e móveis sem girar uma única peça
description.english: Arrange all items and furniture without rotating a single piece
description.french: Arrange tous les objets et meubles sans faire tourner une seule pièce
description.german: Ordne alle Gegenstände und Möbel an, ohne ein einziges Teil zu drehen
description.italian: Sistema tutti gli oggetti e i mobili senza ruotare neanche un pezzo
description.japanese: 一つも回転させずに全てのアイテムと家具を配置する
description.koreana: 어떤 물건도 회전시키지 않고 모든 아이템과 가구를 배치하세요
description.latam: Acomoda todos los objetos y muebles sin rotar ni una sola pieza
description.russian: Расположите все предметы и мебель не поворачивая
description.schinese: 摆放所有物品和家具时不转动任何一件
description.spanish: Acomoda todos los objetos y muebles sin rotar ni una sola pieza
description.tchinese: 擺放所有物品和家具時不旋轉任何一件
description.turkish: Tek bir parçayı döndürmeden tüm eşyaları ve mobilyaları yerleştir

description.brazilian: Coloque todos os itens e móveis no chão
description.english: Place all items and furniture on the floor
description.french: Place tous les objets et meubles sur le sol
description.german: Stelle alle Gegenstände und Möbel auf den Boden
description.italian: Posiziona tutti gli oggetti e i mobili sul pavimento
description.japanese: 全てのアイテムと家具を床に置く
description.latam: Coloca todos los objetos y muebles en el suelo
description.russian: Расположите все предметы и мебель на полу
description.schinese: 将所有物品和家具放在地板上
description.spanish: Coloca todos los objetos y muebles en el suelo
description.tchinese: 將所有物品和家具放在地板上
description.turkish: Tüm eşyaları ve mobilyaları yere koy

description.brazilian: Mova todos os itens para um cômodo se houver dois ou mais cômodos no nível
description.english: Move all items into one room if there are two or more rooms in the level
description.french: Déplace tous les objets dans une seule pièce s'il y a deux pièces ou plus dans le niveau
description.german: Bringe alle Gegenstände in einen Raum, wenn es zwei oder mehr Räume im Level gibt
description.italian: Sposta tutti gli oggetti in una sola stanza se ci sono due o più stanze nel livello
description.japanese: レベルに2部屋以上ある場合は、全てのアイテムを1つの部屋に移動する
description.koreana: 레벨에 방이 두 개 이상 있으면 모든 아이템을 한 방에 옮기세요
description.latam: Mueve todos los objetos a una habitación si hay dos o más habitaciones en el nivel
description.russian: Перетащите все предметы в одну комнату, если комнат в распаковке две и более
description.schinese: 如果关卡中有两个或更多房间，将所有物品移到一个房间里
description.spanish: Mueve todos los objetos a una habitación si hay dos o más habitaciones en el nivel
description.tchinese: 如果關卡中有兩個或更多房間，將所有物品移到一個房間
description.turkish: Seviyede iki veya daha fazla oda varsa tüm eşyaları tek odaya taşı

description.brazilian: Complete o jogo no Modo História
description.english: Complete the game in Story Mode
description.french: Termine le jeu en Mode Histoire
description.german: Schließe das Spiel im Story-Modus ab
description.italian: Completa il gioco in Modalità Storia
description.japanese: ストーリーモードでゲームをクリアする
description.latam: Completa el juego en Modo Historia
description.schinese: 在故事模式中完成游戏
description.spanish: Completa el juego en Modo Historia
description.tchinese: 在故事模式中完成遊戲

description.brazilian: Faça carinho nos brinquedos de pelúcia 100 vezes
description.french: Caresse les jouets en peluche 100 fois
description.japanese: ぬいぐるみを100回撫でる
